definition: to make a full confession/to plead guilty
to avoid mentioning/taboo word/name of deceased emperor or superior

sentences.english: Both boys pleaded guilty to the theft charge and face sentencing at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 这两名男孩对该偷盗指控供认不讳，并将被择日宣判。

sentences.english: Kong diverts the company large amount fund to it the delinquent account to confess fully.
sentences.chinese: 孔某对其挪用公司巨额资金的犯罪事实供认不讳。

sentences.english: The court heard today that O'Connell had previous convictions for theft.
sentences.chinese: 今天，欧康内尔在法庭上对之前的盗窃事实供认不讳。

sentences.english: Sumou of beating things, Lin and 3 per confessed.
sentences.chinese: 对毒打苏某的事情，林某等3人均供认不讳。

sentences.english: Police said the suspect admitted he had committed the crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方称疑犯刘赘衡对犯罪事实供认不讳。

definition: to make an appearance in court
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to detain as criminal/criminal detention/abbr. for 刑事拘留[xing2 shi4 ju1 liu2]
to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
